whatsIncludedSection.includedTitle: Ready to ride, What's in the box?
whatsIncludedSection.includedSubtitle: Get from package to pedal in just a few simple steps. Your Frog bike arrives 95% pre-assembled, so you can focus on the fun part – riding!

mainAssemblyInfo.title: Bike assembly – Quick & easy setup
mainAssemblyInfo.description: Your Frog bike arrives 95% pre-assembled to ensure safe delivery and a hassle-free setup experience. Only a few simple steps are needed to get your child's new bike ready to ride:
assembly_steps: Align and secure the handlebars (pre-positioned for transit)
Attach the pedals (packaged separately for safety)
mainAssemblyInfo.footer_text: Clear step-by-step assembly instructions are available on our website and included in the box. Need help? Our expert customer support team is always ready to guide you through the process.

sidebarInfoCards: 95% pre-build, pre‑aligned components and included tools mean less time wrenching, more time riding.

warrantySection.warrantyTitle: Protect their bike with warranty cover
warrantySection.warrantySubtitle: Ride worry‑free with comprehensive coverage and optional extended protection.

standardWarranty.title: 2 Year Standard Warranty
standardWarranty.description: At Frog Bikes, we stand by the quality of our products with a standard 2-year warranty covering all frames, forks, parts, and paintwork (excluding tyres and inner tubes). Suspension forks are also covered by a 2-year warranty but are not included in our extended warranty offer.

premiumWarranty.title: Warranty Plus
premiumWarranty.description: Looking for extra peace of mind? Activate your FREE 10-year extended consumer warranty on frames and forks (excluding MTB suspension forks) within 28 days of purchase. Keep them riding longer with lasting protection and support from Frog.

warrantySection.warrantyDisclaimer: This extended warranty is available for new, full-priced bikes and bikes purchased directly from our Frog Factory Outlet.

deliverySection.deliverySubtitle: Your Frog bike is built, inspected, and delivered to your door with free standard delivery to mainland UK addresses.

deliveryInfoCards.title: Free delivery
deliveryInfoCards.description: Free standard delivery is available for consumer orders shipping to mainland UK addresses.*

deliveryInfoCards.title: Pre‑assembly
deliveryInfoCards.description: All Frog kids' bikes are carefully assembled, quality-checked, and typically dispatched within 5 business days of order confirmation.

deliveryInfoCards.title: Quality checks
deliveryInfoCards.description: All of our bikes are built, checked and inspected, passing a full bike PDI before being packed and shipped to you.

deliverySection.deliveryDisclaimer: *For deliveries to non-mainland locations, such as Northern Ireland, the Isle of Man, the Channel Islands, or the Scottish Highlands and Islands, additional local taxes, customs fees, or carrier surcharges may apply. These charges are the responsibility of the customer.

supportSection.supportSubtitle: We want you to have the best experience with your new Frog Bike, so our customer service team are only a click or call away!

supportCards.title: Need help? We're here for you
supportCards.description: Our friendly and knowledgeable customer support team is ready to assist you with anything you need, from order updates and product questions to assembly guidance and warranty information. We're here to make your experience smooth and stress-free.
supportCards.detail: Get in touch via email or phone, and we'll be happy to help!

supportCards.title: Got questions?
supportCards.description: Before reaching out, check out our Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) page; it's the quickest way to find clear, helpful answers to common queries. From choosing the right bike size and understanding delivery times to assembly tips and warranty info, we've covered all the essentials.
supportCards.detail: If you can't find what you're looking for, our support team is always just a click away.
